mapper.update: update choice_question set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, `options` = #{options,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where choice_question_id = #{choiceQuestionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select choice_question_id, category_id, answer, score, user_id, post_time, `status`, subject, `options` from choice_question where choice_question_id = #{choiceQuestionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select choice_question_id, category_id, answer, score, user_id, post_time, `status`, subject, `options` from choice_question
